feature.label: Meteor UI
feature.description: Meteor is a tool resulting from a master's degree research work for the applied computing course at IPT (São Paulo Technological Research Institute). It works as a plugin for the Eclipse IDE designed to support developers in validating the success of a test code refactoring. To install Meteor, see the instructions below. To make the project possible, a fork of the Pitclipse project was made to make the necessary changes for the tool's functionality.
